plot: Franz, an unambitious young German, is searching for his mother in Russia, after having received a mysterious letter from her. By failing to find his mother Franz irreversibly falls into a dark hole of despair.
title: Zärtlichkeit
plot_es: Franz, an unambitious young German, is searching for his mother in Russia, after having received a mysterious letter from her. By failing to find his mother Franz irreversibly falls into a dark hole of despair.
plot_en: Franz, an unambitious young German, is searching for his mother in Russia, after having received a mysterious letter from her. By failing to find his mother Franz irreversibly falls into a dark hole of despair.
